Author: grossenten98
Text: I feel for you, I’ve been there! Just take it a as grand feat and resume your normal schedule, your relatives will be pleased(better be) with you for making such an effort to participate with them. Just try to brush of that guilt, there’s nothing to be ashamed about that, it’s not like you did something horrible, you made an effort at he best of your abilities to participate in your family event. (Something I can’t do yet) anyways, hurray to you friend.
